# Register Space

## Device Overview

**[MMU](mmu.md):**

- 1 Device
- 18 Registers @ 16 Bit

**[IRQ](irq.md):**

- 1 Device
- 6 Registers @ 16 Bit

**[UART 16C550-Style](uart.md):**

- 4 Devices
- 8 Registers @ 8 Bit

**[PS/2](ps2.md):**

- 2 Devices
- 2 Registers @ 16 Bit

**[IDE / PATA](ide.md):**

- 1 Device
- 8 Registers @ 16 Bit

**[Timer](timer.md):**

- 2 Devices
- 4 Registers @ 16 Bit

**[RTC](rtc.md):**

- 1 Device
- 3 Registers @ 16 Bit
- 8 Registers @ 8 Bit

**[Joystick](joystick.md):**

- 2 Devices
- 1 Registers @ 8 Bit

**[Parallel Port](parport.md):**

- 1 Device
- 3 Registers @ 8 Bit

**[PCM Audio Control/Status](pcm.md):**

- 1 Device

**[DMA Control/Status](dma.md):**

- 1 Device

**[VGA Card](vga.md):**

- 1 Device
- 3 Registers @ 16 Bit
- 2 Registers @ 8 Bit

**[Ethernet](eth.md):**

- 1 Device
- 3 Registers @ 16 Bit
- 7 Registers @ 8 Bit

**[VGA Palette Memory](vga.md):**

- 1 Device
- 256 Registers @ 16 Bit

## Device Mapping

| Address    | Offset | Peripherial                         |
|------------|--------|-------------------------------------|
| `0x7FE000` |      0 | [MMU](mmu.md)                       |
| `0x7FE030` |     48 | [IRQ](irq.md)                       |
| `0x7FE040` |     64 | [UART 16C550-Style (1)](uart.md)    |
| `0x7FE050` |     80 | [UART 16C550-Style (2)](uart.md)    |
| `0x7FE060` |     96 | [UART 16C550-Style (3)](uart.md)    |
| `0x7FE070` |    112 | [UART 16C550-Style (4)](uart.md)    |
| `0x7FE080` |    128 | [PS/2 (1)](ps2.md)                  |
| `0x7FE090` |    144 | [PS/2 (2)](ps2.md)                  |
| `0x7FE0A0` |    160 | [IDE / PATA](ide.md)                |
| `0x7FE0B0` |    176 | [Timer (1)](timer.md)               |
| `0x7FE0C0` |    192 | [Timer (2)](timer.md)               |
| `0x7FE0D0` |    208 | [RTC](rtc.md)                       |
| `0x7FE0E0` |    224 | [Joystick (1)](joystick.md)         |
| `0x7FE0F0` |    240 | [Joystick (2)](joystick.md)         |
| `0x7FE100` |    256 | [Parallel Port](parport.md)         |
| `0x7FE110` |    272 | [PCM Audio Control/Status](pcm.md)  |
| `0x7FE110` |    272 | [DMA Control/Status](dma.md)        |
| `0x7FE110` |    272 | [VGA Card](vga.md)                  |
| `0x7FE120` |    288 | [Ethernet](eth.md)                  |
| `0x7FE200` |    512 | [VGA Palette Memory](vga.md)        |
| `0x7FE400` |   1024 | *end of peripherials*               |
